website_summaries.verdict: A high-quality frame offering exceptional wooden bed slats alongside a lower profile.
pros: Great frame for those wanting a minimalist or modern look
Available in 4 color finishes and bed sizes
Extremely sturdy when compared with other models
cons: A few owners had issues with "rusty powder" spilling out of packaging

customer_reviews.title: Killer little bed
customer_reviews.text: Great. Works well with my all foam tuft & needle mattress, no sagging. Yet to shag on it, but so far no squeaks. I'll keep you posted
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: The light gray looks good with whites, taupes, grays. It seems really sturdy, with a low center of gravity. nicely low to the floor.
customer_reviews.author: sscaceres

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and has a nice finish. It doesn't squeak at all. I would absolutely buy another one of these. I was worried about being too low to the ground but it gives me plenty of clearance to still store things. Also my headboard didn't attach to this, but sits nicely behind it. You can't tell it isn't attached. Be prepared for a heavy box to arrive. And assembly was easy. Lasted the boards that it came with were of good quality and were solid. *I also bought the headboard on Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Michael

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, nice product for the $$, really disappointed that the frame has a rather large ding (likely by FEDEX who delivered box torn, I questioned but they said was normal, so I didn't sign damaged... ALWAYS sign off if box is torn/damaged). Months later still happy with it!!
customer_reviews.author: frequentshopper

customer_reviews.title: very sturdy bed
customer_reviews.text: It's very sturdy and stable. However, as many reviewers pointed, the bolts and threads are poorly made. In fact, some bolts went very tough even though the holes perfectly matched. Probably, bad threads or bolts. First, I wanted to return and give a bad review, however the customer service done a great a job - they promptly sent me a new set of bolts and asked if I need any replacement parts. I selected new bolts they were good, and it worked out pretty well. I like this bed much better than wooden ones, cause it's very sturdy like a stone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice.
customer_reviews.text: I must say. This is the first time in a longtime that I am very pleased with this product. The designer and or engineers took their skills very seriously. I highly recommend this frame. Keep in mind it raises the mattress 9 inches from the floor. It works great for me, and I'm glad you see a company GO the extra.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks good but the first one I got was not properly ...
customer_reviews.text: Looks good but the first one I got was not properly manufactured and I could not finish the assembly of the frame. Then when I got the second one as a replacement.... it came bent. Do a careful inspection upon arrival. Chances are there is something wrong with it.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin Avery

customer_reviews.title: Sleek, modern, well worth the (very reasonable) price!
customer_reviews.text: This bed was very easy to put together, as a team we put it up in less than half an hour. If you have an allen wrench set with a handle it might be helpful, but it does come with a basic one for assembly. The frame is very heavy and sturdy, which is exactly what I needed for two larger people including someone with a disability who needs to rely on sturdy furniture for support. The color is attractive but subtle. It is best to have a drill handy to secure the wooden slats into the pre-drilled holes of the frame so they don't move .
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: This bed frame was a great find and awesome deal
customer_reviews.text: This bed frame was a great find and awesome deal. It looks great and I spent hundreds less than I would have on a frame while still achieving the same aesthetic. It is super sturdy, but at the same time lightweight for easy moving. Assembly was very easy, it took around 20 or 30 minutes to complete without help from anyone else. Shipping was fast and reliable.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel B

customer_reviews.title: Comes with an infestation of tiny bugs on wooden slats
customer_reviews.text: The directions for the bed frame were simple to follow and the frame itself was easy to put together. The main issue is, that when it came time to put the wooden slats on the bed, I noticed that there were little tiny bugs crawling all over the wood. Very disappointed, do not recommend a complete waste of money and time. Very poor quality control on this sellers part.
customer_reviews.author: S.P.

customer_reviews.title: Went together fairly easy. Was very heavy
customer_reviews.text: For $150.00, I guess I get what I paid for. Went together fairly easy. Was very heavy. First week, it was good. No squeaks, lower than I really wanted. But by week 3 that's when it went downhill. Sat in bed and heard a squeak. Shifted, more squeaks. Now it's almost as bad as my last bed. Disappointed but don't want to go through the hassle of setting up another bed frame. They also sent a free pillow. That was even more disappointing. Just donated it to good will.
customer_reviews.author: AG85

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy bed
customer_reviews.text: Took about an hour to put together with the tiny Allen wrench provided. Tried using a ratchet screwdriver with the same size Allen wrench tip but half of the screws are too close to the frame to allow it to be turned. As usual a couple of the screws wouldn't go completely in without the screw head becoming stripped. The chunky legs make it look beefy. It is a solid bed. The only reason for the fours stars is that the mattress slides on the slats when you lean against it. I'm going to have to think about putting some sort of grip across a couple of the slats.
customer_reviews.author: JXX

customer_reviews.title: Slats break
customer_reviews.text: The bed frame is nice but 2 of the wooden slats have broken after 3 months from just sitting on the bed. I only weigh 150lb, seems like they should be stronger. Otherwise I really like it.
customer_reviews.author: minori a.

customer_reviews.title: Stella Metal Platform Bed Frame
customer_reviews.text: received this frame friday, put it together myself, I am 68 yrs old, very sturdy, very happy with it slept well on it.
customer_reviews.author: Joann Heriford

customer_reviews.title: The wooden bars are so flimsy
customer_reviews.text: The frame is really nice quality but the wooden bars that are supposed to support your mattress are sooo flimsy i sat on my bed and one snapped and i weigh 200 pounds
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to put together just a bit difficult to tighten ...
customer_reviews.text: The queen size came in 1 box.when I took out all of the pieces out of the box I did find that some pieces were dent and scratched. luckily for me it is mostly hidden underneath the mattress and comforter. Very easy to put together just a bit difficult to tighten the bolts.
customer_reviews.author: JC A.

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly High Quality / Very Impressed
customer_reviews.text: This product was incredibly well packaged, the materials are very high quality, and it actually made my mattress feel better which was a surprise benefit. We were just going for a better looking platform, but the additional support compared to our previous unit made for a better nights sleep. The only con was two of the screws stripped themselves, and I had to use a locking vice grip to finish the project. We're so pleased that we will be ordering two more and showing it off to friends and family. You will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Robert C Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Nice, simple bed - great for a small space.
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice simple bed. I needed something for my guest room after my exhusband stole furniture from my home. The directions could be a little better, because I initially installed the side rails unpaid down. However it’s pretty simple to put together, but tedious to use the Allen wrench. Getting it out of the box was more difficult than putting it together. The center support piece didn’t touch the ground based on where the holes are drilled in.
customer_reviews.author: Agatha

customer_reviews.title: The bed frame is sturdy and quiet
customer_reviews.text: Very heavy, packaging was a mess to take apart. Screws don't completely screw in. The center bar doesn't even touch the floor, maybe it's for when you lay down the bed presses it down. I don't know. The bed frame is sturdy and quiet. Frame is simple. I don't know how I feel about paying $100+. I think I got what I paid for.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: This thing is Sturdy! Look no further!
customer_reviews.text: Firstly you get bang for your buck with this. I got full size brushed gold color and it is beautiful. Trust me when I say I’ve looked and looked for days before deciding on a frame. I picked this one because it’s heavy duty and has more wide slats than all the others I looked at. No creaking and the hubs had it put together in about 30mins. Super self explanatory. He said it was the easiest thing he’s put together. I’m impressed! Will update after I’ve had it for a bit!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria M.

customer_reviews.title: Platform bed
customer_reviews.text: It is a solid bed that is easy to put together. The pieces are metal so it is heavy and I had to bring it upstairs in pieces. Sleeping on a platform bed has a different feel so that takes some adjusting. I recommend purchasing a Bunkie board as well because the cross slats move and you don't have a consistent feel under the mattress or it bunches up and when you sit on the end of the bed, you fall thru. I was not able to attach my headboard to the frame which was a little disappointing. It is still a good value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: CEG1018

customer_reviews.title: Very good, sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Not missing pieces, easy to setup. Heavy as all hell though! So far enjoying it quite a bit. Makes the support in a bed much nicer and adds firmness. Not moving or squeaking at all. We got it on sale and it is well worth every penny. Edit: the makers of this fabulous frame sent us a free set of pillows after the fact, which are fantastic as well! Makes the purchase even more worth it! The pillows are sooooo comfy and just the right amount of support! Edit: four months in and no worries or issues.
customer_reviews.author: DK MannTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Love it but...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality, sturdy, and easy to assemble. However, while there are holes on the inside of the bedframe for a headboard, there are no headboards available to fit inside the frame, even from the manufacturer. Remedy: put the holes on the outside of the frame.
customer_reviews.author: NVR831

customer_reviews.title: Rust ruined my carpet !!!
customer_reviews.text: The long hollow rails dumped a ton of rusty powder onto my white carpet. It did not vacuum up. Tried to clean it, but had to replace carpet. Total cost was over $700. I suggest you unpack product outdoors and whack those bed rails to knock out the rust. Otherwise the bed is fine.
customer_reviews.author: L. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: You will need an electric screwdriver, or someone with really, really strong hands to put this together.
customer_reviews.text: This really is hard to put together. I read the other reviews and thought "pfft, I've got this. I've put together many IKEA items no problem." I was wrong. You will need an electric screwdriver, or someone with really, really strong hands. Other than that, functions as intended! Great, minimalistic bed frame. The mattress doesn't slip around at all.
customer_reviews.author: Marina

customer_reviews.title: The bed is very beautiful and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: The bed is very beautiful and sturdy, yet light. The only problem came when I bought the matching honeycomb headboard- the holes to attach headboard to the bed do not match. My husband is going to have to improvise and make new holes
customer_reviews.author: A.DTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: So sweet and simple
customer_reviews.text: Love this bed frame! Will update in a couple months if she starts squeaking! The white is slightly yellow, like antique white.. doesn’t really match the rest of my stuff but it’s cute enough to be worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Jess G.

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy bed. It does take a bit to put ...
customer_reviews.text: Came late due to label getting destroyed but they quickly resent a replacement. Very sturdy bed. It does take a bit to put together but what furniture doesn't. My hubby is a big guy and so far the bed frame has held up. I would prefer it to be a little higher off the ground, 9inches sounds higher than it is in person but it'll work. Definitely would be a struggle for someone older or with bad knees getting up n the morning. We got this and a 10inch sleep ultima memory foam bed. Great deal!!! only $380 for a mattress and bedframe...can't beat that.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value for the money
customer_reviews.text: This bed is very nice looking and extremely sturdy (made from complete tube metal construction). I have a several layer all latex mattress that is easily a couple hundred pounds and has no problem supporting the weight. Doesn't sag, the included support boards make it so you do not need a box spring underneath (if you have a newer latex or memory foam mattress). Also the height is just right. Not super low to the floor but not to high neither. All around I'm pleased with my purchase. For this price point an excellent choice imo.
customer_reviews.author: Otis Jayroe

customer_reviews.title: Solid, attractive, simple, and no sqeaking.
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with purchase so far (had for two weeks). Went together very quick. Looks great, the black coating had more texture than expected but in a good way. Great height. Is light and the edges are rounded so that you don't hurt your ankles/toes walking close to the edge. The wooden planks feel sturdy and there is no squeak to it. Great platform bed for the price. (The only minor thing we might change is the screws took a bit to put in with an Allen wrench but we understand that might be handy for those without tools.) Seens like a great option for those who move every few years and need something light and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but it has been great. Very heavy but fairly easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: I have only had it for about a month so far, but it has been great. Very heavy but fairly easy to put together. I had help from another person, but I probably could have done it on my own, too. I wasn't sure if I would like my bed lower to the ground than my old frame, but I am finding that I love it. This frame is very thick and sturdy, and I have no doubt it will last a long time. No moving, no squeaking. Also, I am still able to put a couple of storage bins underneath -- had to lift the bed to slide them under the frame, but they fit under the slats.
customer_reviews.author: ChrisB

customer_reviews.title: I love it and am thinking of buying two more for my guest rooms!
customer_reviews.text: This bed frame is beautiful, minimal, and very sturdy. It was incredibly easy and quick to set up. The box was pretty heavy and required some sliding down my stairs to get into the bedroom to open. No missing hardware and it was quickly tested and approved by my pups.
customer_reviews.author: Beejikins

customer_reviews.title: It seems to be very sturdy and went together well
customer_reviews.text: When we received this frame it had been damaged in shipment. Contacted MK and they responded immediately and sent replacement parts. They also followed up to make sure everything was okay. My husband was able to assemble the bed frame in about 1 1/2 hours. It seems to be very sturdy and went together well. The frame is low, but our mattress is 17 inches so it makes it just the right height to easily get into. We are very pleased with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Patrick

customer_reviews.title: This was a pain in the rear to put together ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a pain in the rear to put together but i would NOT have purchased anything else. Once you have it together this is the most stable bed frame that i have had in almost 2 decades. Worth every freaking penny just know going in your going to put some time into putting it together!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Some of the reviews of this bed frame made me anticipate issues with its quality and challenges in assembly. Fortunately, it was a breeze to assemble - about 20 minutes and the quality was excellent - as was the packaging. Good value and well made.
customer_reviews.author: Luigi Facotti

customer_reviews.title: Great Bed Frame!!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic bed. Easy to assemble. All parts went together without any problems. Took about 20 minutes to set up. Very sturdy and makes no squeaking sounds. It also looks really nice! Was shipped very fast and very well packaged. The outer box had some tears, etc. but the frame was perfect; no dents or scratches. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: SBBLUEWATER

customer_reviews.title: I love this bed
customer_reviews.text: I love this bed. It was fairly easy to put together and looks great. The wide slat boards are tied together with ribbon so they're super easy to put on (no snapping in one board at at time). The frame itself is made of sturdy metal. It is a really minimalist type of bed which I love.
customer_reviews.author: A. Boehm

customer_reviews.title: Great bed frame
customer_reviews.text: Love this bed frame! It looks better in person than on the site even. We put it together in about 30 minutes, was pretty self explanatory. Put our foam mattress on it and slept like a baby. It's a sturdy, well made metal frame and the color goes with everything. Would definitely but another product from this seller.
customer_reviews.author: Tina B.

customer_reviews.title: The frame is really quite nice. It was fairly easy to set up and ...
customer_reviews.text: The frame is really quite nice. It was fairly easy to set up and seems to be very solid. I currently have my box spring on there as well due to a lack of place to store it, and it adds some nice height actually. Doesn't creak or anything like that, which I was honestly worried about with a frame of this price! The particle board slats the mattress lays on do have a pretty strong smell to them initially, which kind of worried me after reading about the chemicals that might cause said smells, but de-gasing for a few days helped a lot. Overall very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bed
customer_reviews.text: Great product very easy to put together seems sturdy The box however is very heavy and hard to open But love the bed
customer_reviews.author: Truc Phan

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely a great frame for twice the money. I put it together by myself (middle aged woman) in around 45 minutes (from box to having the mattress on it). I am used to doing this kind of project by myself. This thing is really sturdy. It is low be if I want a change, I’ll throw a box spring on it and have a completely different look. No loose joints and no squeaking. More cream than white.
customer_reviews.author: Punk Rock Patti

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Love these bed frames. I have had one in my room for the last 3 years and I initially purchased while my husband was on deployment. It was easy for me to assemble on my own. The slates are still in perfect condition even after 3 years. I just purchased 2 more and I know without a doubt they will last over time as well.
customer_reviews.author: K'Cee C

customer_reviews.title: Solid
customer_reviews.text: Rock Solid. Just make sure you DO NOT tighten screws UNTIL entire bed is put together. The negative comments about holes not lining up were because screws were made tight as bed was put together.
customer_reviews.author: KBeam

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Platform!! So Easy to Assemble
customer_reviews.text: At a great price, this is a great platform. Looks fantastic, so solid and so easy to put together. Got it in black and I couldn't be happier. I received it very quickly and was happy to receive a personalized email checking to see if I was completely satisfied. I sure am!
customer_reviews.author: DJ62

customer_reviews.title: Quality and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I had searched and searched for a decent well build platform bed frame! This is it! This bed is made very well, easy to put together and quality made. I am buying one for my bedroom as well. I am also buying ceiling rustic tin squares to screw to the wall as a faux headboard. Glad I bought this bed!
customer_reviews.author: Molli Montgomery

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy frame.
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping. Easy to assemble. Very sturdy! There are plastic "feet"under the legs, I was worried moving the bed would scratch the floor being that it's metal. The only bad thing I can say is the allen wrench was missing. There was a spot for it with all the other hardware, just wasn't in the package. Love the finish (black), it appears the finish will hold up very well.
customer_reviews.author: Micheal Magnuson

customer_reviews.title: best frame easy and fast
customer_reviews.text: great for a king mattress. Who need box springs? I can now site on the side of the bed and puts my shoes on and the dogs have no problem getting on the bed. Wait that`s not a good thing.
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: Nice frame but dimensions are wrong
customer_reviews.text: The dimensions posted are not correct..posting says 39" wide..the bed frame is 40" wide. This messed up my plan because my mattress does not fit right so the slats are visible. The frame is sturdy. The assembly instructions are easy but the screws go in very hard. Hence 4 stars not 5
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Its pretty heavy duty with quality parts, low profile. Was what you'd expect
customer_reviews.author: markus knows

customer_reviews.title: Terrific sturdy bed frame!
customer_reviews.text: There was a shipping issue causing a few weeks delay, but the bed itself is awesome! It was very easy to assemble, it's crazy sturdy, and doesn't squeak or shake. We love it so much! Great price too.
customer_reviews.author: RedGale

customer_reviews.title: Sits low to the ground.
customer_reviews.text: Great buy for the money! Sits low to the ground but with enough clearing for things like shoe boxes, small bags, etc. I wish it had a few more slats at the end of the bed because it feels like there isn't as much support and the end of the bed; a slat would fix that. However for the price, this was a great buy and it looks nice.
customer_reviews.author: Abdullah

customer_reviews.title: A perfect package
customer_reviews.text: I was able to put this together easily in a n hour. It is durable, well made and the perfect size for me to sit in the bed comfortably. My cat has enough room to goubderneath and my older dog doesn’t have to jump high or hit any foot boards.
customer_reviews.author: N.Gregory

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This bed frame is perfect. It came very well packaged with no damage. The frame looks exactly like the picture, low to the ground but high enough that your blanket won't touch the floor. No box spring required. It was very simple to put together with no help. The instructions were clear. It took me about 20 minutes. I've put together plenty of IKEA frames and this frame is MUCH more durable in my opinion. I'm so impressed by the way the frame is constructed. This frame could easily be sold for twice the price. The quality is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: milena

customer_reviews.title: I really don’t like this bed!
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Affordable Shipped fast Stylish Cons: Wooden slats break apart Too many parts Bed never sits level The bed always slides on my wood floors
customer_reviews.author: Alexa88

customer_reviews.title: Great quality but mattress will slide
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy, no squeaking and easy to assemble! I have a slanted ceiling in my room so I wanted a very short frame as to avoid hitting my head and it's nice and low to the ground. There's still 6" of room under the bed so I can even store some things underneath. My only complaint is the mattress slides around a lot because there's nothing holding it in on the sides, it just kind of sits on top of the frame.
customer_reviews.author: mmc

customer_reviews.title: No box spring needed, low profile and easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: Really nice and sturdy. My boyfriend put it together in less than an hour and it doesnt require a box spring which is one of the reasons I bought it. Very low profile and stick out only about an inch from the mattress itself so it won't take up a huge amount of space.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandria

customer_reviews.title: Problems with the screw holes to hold it together.
customer_reviews.text: The screw holes to hold it together were not properly drilled in one corner so the screws will not tighten to hold the frame together.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Hall

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: This bed is low, which is what we wanted for the kids to get in and out. It’s super sturdy and not squeaky at all. The brushed effect makes it not look like metal. We’re very pleased. Paired it with an amazon mattress and we saved so much money and are so happy
customer_reviews.author: Emily Bonheim

customer_reviews.title: Well made- sturdy bedframe.
customer_reviews.text: the bedframe is extremely sturdy and the mattress fits perfectly. i am very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: chado63

customer_reviews.title: Biggest bang for the buck we've found, for this type of product.
customer_reviews.text: This is the sturdiest, most well-built frame we've ever purchased. For the price, you cannot go wrong. Moreover, it is so easily assembled that the whole process can be completed in about fifteen minutes! I highly recommend this to anyone that needs a bed frame, but doesn't want to spend a lot of money on unnecessary "aesthetics." It is ideal for the budget-conscious shopper.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Hurtado

customer_reviews.title: Super sturdy, and holds my Tempurpedic mattress very well
customer_reviews.text: Super sturdy, and holds my Tempurpedic mattress very well. Doesn't squeak at all, and it's stylish. I think it will hold up the next time I move. Only downside was this was a bit difficult to put together and lower than I thought. The bults and screws were a struggle and took the majority of the time to tighten during assembly. I kind of wish I paid the extra $87 to have it delivered assembled.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Not bad!
customer_reviews.text: It appears as though it is lighter weight than the last bed frame that I had and it was EASY and FAST to put together. I am glad that I didn't need to hire the people who assemble beds...it would have been a waste of money. I really dig the color and the low height of the bed frame.
customer_reviews.author: Peppi

customer_reviews.title: The bed is sturdy, as described and looks great
customer_reviews.text: The bed is sturdy, as described and looks great. There was a small ding in the frame (I assume due to the shipping company, not the seller or manufacturer) that is hardly noticeable. It was incredibly well packed and protected, and when some of the screws were stripped due to tightening issues I contacted MK furnishings. They responded and had new screws shipped out in a day; that was something I greatly appreciated, and the level of customer service is fantastic for that reason.
customer_reviews.author: chris nilson

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This bed feels very sturdy and I love the look. It's not as gold as I expected, it's a little more brassy, but it still looks great in my room. It was easy to assemble, I'm a small lady and did it by myself in about an hour.
customer_reviews.author: sheenachu

customer_reviews.title: Excellent platform bed that met all expectations.
customer_reviews.text: It is just the right height and is solid. Fairly easy to put together and even the family pet likes the height.
customer_reviews.author: Fire in the sky

customer_reviews.title: It's sturdy and low to the ground
customer_reviews.text: This bed frame is just what I wanted. It's sturdy and low to the ground. It's also a good deal quieter than my previous bed frame. The assembly was simple enough . I would recommend a screw driver or drill motor for the bolts. They screw in tight, as they should to avoid being creaky, but it takes a good deal of hand strength with the tool provided to get them in tight. All in all, I'm happy with my purchase. Once assembled it is a solid bed frame for the money.
customer_reviews.author: A. Koehler

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: You can not go wrong for the money! Much nicer than I expected and very sturdy. Simple clean look!
customer_reviews.author: Maddog

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and looks great
customer_reviews.text: Put it together in 30 minutes. Hardest part was opening the box, low to floor and perfect transition bed for toddlers
customer_reviews.author: Stefanie S.

customer_reviews.title: Modern and Simple
customer_reviews.text: This bed is great! It is very low so make sure that you measure before you purchase. It is sturdy, well made, and looks great! It was also very easy to put together! I love it. It also arrived early. All pros, no cons.
customer_reviews.author: bobbysgirl

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Sleeping Solution!!!
customer_reviews.text: This bed was the perfect solution and exactly what I was ultimately looking for. The construction is perfection, the look fits my design scheme, and the price was on point. Putting it together was easy and didn't take very long to do so. I have slept on my new frame and mattress for over a month now and I am fully satisfied. I would suggest anyone looking for a metal, low profile bed frame to seriously take this one into consideration and purchase it!
customer_reviews.author: J. Curtis

customer_reviews.title: Perfect sturdy bed frame, does not squeak with tightened screws
customer_reviews.text: The value for money is amazing. We love this frame. If you do not want it to squeak you MUST tighten the screws to their fullest without stripping the metal. We had to retighten one time after building it and now it has not squeaked once after 4 months of heavy use ;)
customer_reviews.author: bryan james chin

customer_reviews.title: Product damaged and not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived damaged. I don't think its worth the price. I will say the photos are very decieving because it looks like a wood frame in the pics but be sure to read in the info that it is a metal frame and I think it does not look anything like wood.
customer_reviews.author: Lacey

customer_reviews.title: A year in and doing great
customer_reviews.text: I have the king size-it was easy to put together and have moved the bed several times which is pretty easy as well considering how heavy it is. Very sturdy-I use it with a memory foam mattress (I want to say it’s about 16 in) and have zero problems with the wood slats.
customer_reviews.author: Cosmetish

customer_reviews.title: Modern design
customer_reviews.text: Very heavy package! Assembly was not difficult, but the pieces are fairly heavy. Sleek and simple design, feels very sturdy. Looks great and was just what I had been looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: easy to installl
customer_reviews.text: Firm, easy to installl. A bit squeaky when having sex
customer_reviews.author: Xéxare Ibarra

customer_reviews.title: Easy to build, sturdy and looks good
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure about buying a bed frame online but this really worked out. It only took about an hour to put together with just one person. It looks great and is built well.
customer_reviews.author: Michael L

customer_reviews.title: I love this bed
customer_reviews.text: I love this bed ! It's very sturdy and easy to assemble. Looks nice in my modern bedroom. I hope to buy the matching headboard later. I highly recommend this bed and am so happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money
customer_reviews.text: I love the simplicity of this bed. It has a nice finish and it's pretty sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Y. Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Great bed.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very sturdy platform bed at a reasonable cost. The assembly is easy with the provided instructions. I especially liked that the slats could be attached to the side rails with 3 pairs of screws. So the slats don't make any noise with a heavy mattress on top.
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: AS GOOD AS IT LOOKS
customer_reviews.text: easy to assemble and fit together perfectly. Very solid but not too heavy. Great low profile modern look. No holes for headboard, mattress does not recess like some frames have to hold it in place. I haven't seen another this color. It's a creamy grayish white streaked with beige, and looks good with the grey things in the room. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl B.

customer_reviews.title: This is the second one of these I have purchased ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one of these I have purchased, First one assembled without a problem. Second one drill holes are too small for the screws and the screw heads got stripped. hoping the seller will remedy the faulty product.
customer_reviews.author: Christian

customer_reviews.title: very sturdy and would definitely survive a move
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described, very sturdy and would definitely survive a move. However screw insertion feels forced however and would strain your average buyer to insert completely. Manufacturer needs to improve threads where screws are tapped.
customer_reviews.author: Anyone

customer_reviews.title: Great bed frame. Loses a star for terrible packaging.
customer_reviews.text: For the price this thing is ridiculously solid. pretty easy to build, if you've got a cordless drill or driver its event easier. Quality of the fasteners is somewhat questionable, but they made up for that in quantity. The packaging is HORRID.
customer_reviews.author: Chris McEliece

customer_reviews.title: Great Bug!
customer_reviews.text: Terrific product. I was afraid it would be too plain but it’s extremely well made and versatile. Very easy to assemble!
customer_reviews.author: liz winchell

customer_reviews.title: Looks exactly like it does in the picture
customer_reviews.text: Looks exactly like it does in the picture. The color is so pretty and was easy to put together. However, my bed keeps sliding on the platform.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good frame
customer_reviews.text: This queen frame was really well packaged. Not a scratch on it. Paint looks nice and durable. I wish they had painted the whole thing rather than just what's visible but that's fine. Only issue was two holes were off a bit so I will have to fix that with a drill but all together good buy and very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: The frame came dented. The slats have a terrible smell.
customer_reviews.text: The frame came dented. The slats smell awful due to the quality of the wood. I am worried that it may be a health hazard. I didn’t expect much with a bed frame that only costs less than 200 dollars, but it’s really frustrating receiving a damaged product.
customer_reviews.author: Janelle

customer_reviews.title: I love this bed
customer_reviews.text: Used this to replace a perfectly usable day bed in my living room. I love this bed. It is simple with a clean look. Best of all it is easy to move and despite being a metal frame I have not stubbed my toe :)
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Hard to assemble. Requires special tools.
customer_reviews.text: Nice color. Solid. Sturdy. Bed does not move. Good height.
customer_reviews.author: Amazongirl

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful look and very easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Bed is very strong and stable. Beautiful look and very easy to put together. The packaging was not appropriate and it had two dings on the sides. Seller gave me a discount. Happy camper here.
customer_reviews.author: huarique

customer_reviews.title: Style and Quality at a Great Price
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bedframe! It’s well made and easy to put together. The frame is sturdy and well designed. Looks gorgeous. It’s a quality product. Very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Elle

customer_reviews.title: The comfort is perfect and the height with a mattress and box spring ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the third Stella platform bed frame I have purchased. It outdoes all three other types of frames including a $600 dollar bed from Ikea. The comfort is perfect and the height with a mattress and box spring is exactly right. The powder coat finish is exquisite and a simple black fitted sheet over the box spring compliments the black satin finish.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: they're perfect! Super low to the ground
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 twins for my 4 and 6 year olds, they're perfect! Super low to the ground, which is what I wanted. I lay down on them each night with my 4 year old, and it makes no noise. And the color is more champagne/gray, but it still works.
customer_reviews.author: Addie

customer_reviews.title: I use it with a memory foam mattress with no foundation and the slate size and distance is perfect. I accidentally received the
customer_reviews.text: It's a little difficult to put together but it's very stable and secure. I use it with a memory foam mattress with no foundation and the slate size and distance is perfect. I accidentally received the wrong item first but the sellers were really helpful in getting everything sorted out.
customer_reviews.author: Tonya Ryals

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Good value for the price. Easy assembly, works as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: School Nurse Ofelia

customer_reviews.title: BAD PRODUCT! LOOK ELSEWHERE!
customer_reviews.text: Quality was extremely poor. multiple problems with bolt threading and incorrect placement of holes. buy something else this is a product that will waste your time and money!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic bed frame
customer_reviews.text: Extremely well made and easy to assemble. Took me about 40 mins to assemble by myself. I got the king size and it hold very well and does not move and im a big guy. Great build, great materials. Hughly reccomended over other frames, especially for bigger guys
customer_reviews.author: Anon7

customer_reviews.text: Beautiful .My mattress measures 10 inches and my bed does not look so high but I like it. the base is comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Laroca

customer_reviews.title: It's good product for the price.
customer_reviews.text: This bed has been well done except for little squeak, also one of the screw hole didn't fit any of the screws that comes with the hardware.
customer_reviews.author: Javier

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as expected
customer_reviews.text: Needed a simple low profile bed frame with a minimalist look.
customer_reviews.author: Ian A Leik

product_meta.title: In Style Furnishings Stella Modern Metal Low Profile Thick Slats Support Platform Bed Frame - Twin Size, Black
product_meta.description:
Color:Black| Size:Twin

Stylish & Modern

This stunning twin size Stella metal platform bed frame makes a brilliant addition to any bedroom. It radiates modern style, bringing a touch of the dramatic to any bedroom. Enjoy lifelong performance with its black coated finish that resists rust, chips, scratches and wear. This platform bed frame is built with durability in mind, and benefits from the strong steel frame and legs.

Excellent Support

The solid wooden thick slats are constructed with excellent strength to provide sturdy support to any mattress. Its frame construction perfectly embeds your mattress to avoid sliding or wobbling, protecting it from warping or sagging and ensuring longer mattress life and comfort. It is designed to provide reliable support for your memory foam, latex, or spring mattress; and is sturdy enough to support heavier deluxe mattresses (mattresses NOT included). With this bed frame, you'll eliminate the need for a base or box spring.

For Any Room

It features a height that is just perfect for getting in and out effortlessly - and if you have a small dog or aging pet allowed to sleep on your bed, this frame is ideal. This piece will surely complement all your furnishings and bedroom decor, whether in a guest room, a master suite or even a studio college apartment. Simple and stunning, definitely the bedroom solution that you've always wanted.

Easy Assembly

Easy to set-up with no additional tools needed and easy to disassemble as well. It features a height that is just perfect for getting in and out effortlessly.
feature_bullets: Twin Size, 76"L x 39"W x 9"H - Metal Frame, Thick Wood Slats
PREMIUM QUALITY: Strong and durable solid support for any mattress. Frame offers even-body distribution for a good night's sleep.
TIMELESS APPEAL: Designed to infuse modern style and contemporary appeal to your bedroom.
BETTER SLEEP: Guaranteed to give you a peaceful sleep every night, as the metal frame prevents mattress sliding or wobbling.
BEST USES: Guest bedrooms, modern room designs, minimalist room design, loft living, studio apartments, master suites.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars590 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
